body: Your mythic power is enough to sustain you. You no longer need to eat, drink, or breathe to live. You're immune to inhaled poisons and any spell or effect that requires breathing, though you are still affected by any food or drink you intake.
name: Mythic Sustenance
url: pfsrd://Mythic Adventures/Rules/Mythic Heroes/Mythic Heroes/Universal Path Abilities/1st-Tier Universal Path Abilities/Mythic Sustenance
